simple-xmpp.js

simple-xmpp.js
Functions
setPresenceChange presence appearance and set status message.

Events
chatstateEmitted when an incoming <message/> with a chatstate notification is received.

Functions

setPresence

this.setPresence = function(show,
status)

Change presence appearance and set status message.

Parameters

show<show/> value to send.  Valid values are: [‘away’, ‘chat’, ‘dnd’, ‘xa’].  See http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc3921.html#rfc.section.2.2.2.1 for details.  Pass anything that evaluates to ‘false’ to skip sending the <show/> element.
status(optional) status string.  This is free text.

TODO

  • add caps support

setChatstate

this.setChatstate = function(to,
state)

Send current chatstate to the given recipient.  Chatstates are defined in XEP-0085.

Parameters

toJID to send the chatstate to
stateState to publish.  One of: active, composing, paused, inactive, gone

See XEP-0085 for details on the meaning of those states.

Events

chatstate

Emitted when an incoming <message/> with a chatstate notification is received.

Event handler parameters

jidthe JID this chatstate noticiation originates from
statenew chatstate we’re being notified about.

See <SimpleXMPP#setChatstate> for details on chatstates.
